body_text: Array.prototype.some would be more appropriate here than just find, but they both return truthy responses, so it's just a nit.
body: [`Array.prototype.some`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/some) would be more appropriate here than just `find`, but they both return truthy responses, so it's just a nit.
